reviewText: if your looking for nudity this ain't it if you like girls in swimsuits and endless interviewing this thing is just for you I'd rather have my teeth removed than ever watch this again
If you like to watch models pose, then you'll enjoy this film.  The models do an excellent job to show their goodies.

This is the only Fit Models DVD I have watched and I purchased it because Taylor Kennedy, a big bust model, is featured. For that reason alone I give it 5 stars (6 if available). Taylor is almost impossible to find on video and this is a good one with several vignettes with her starring, plus some brief interviews. Still, the nudity wins out and makes this worthwhile!

No, this is not a DVD about playing any kind of card games.
This DVD is about beautiful naked fitness models & was shot in the world's most notorious nests of unashamed sexual immorality: The Hedonism nudist resort in Negril, Jamaica.
The footage is completely uninhibited, unscripted & unbelievable!
Full frontal nudity & a variety of girls just being wild. Butt shots also. These girls just can't stop taking off their clothes. Whether they are dripping wet in the calm clear surf or rolling around in the white sand, this DVD is hot. The women are truly beautiful & busty. A variety of girls to make parts of a man or women throb.
Disc features:
15 sizzling scenes, model interviews, behind the scene footage & extensive photo gallery.
The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I wasn't the photographer.

WARNING: This is NOT the Pay-per-view special with Olivia Munn (of G4 tv's "Attack of the Show") and Kato Kaelin as co-hosts (they are NOT in any of the other volumes as well). There is NO poker shown or discussed at all in this, or any of the 6 volumes sold on this website!! I don't believe the PPV special has even been released on Dvd yet! This Dvd is just a topless (no full nudity) swimsuit photo shoot at The Hedonism II nudist resort in Negril, Jamaica, with the following girls:

* Loretta Lynn
* Marlene Burns
* Tina Antero
* Roneique Banks
* Megan Devoe
* Kristen Jackson

I'm giving this Dvd 2 stars simply because the girls are attractive enough. The brief interviews with some of them just point out how their beauty is all they have going for them.

Another annoying thing is that if you press stop and then try to continue the Dvd later, it will instead start from the beginning instead of from where you left off--so just use pause. No running time is shown on the dvd counter, but it's about 49 minutes long.

So, if you're looking to watch poker, you're out of luck!! You've been warned!!
